quote: “You will never be able to escape from your heart. So it's better to listen to what it has to say.”
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: “Don't live down to expectations. Go out there and do something remarkable.”
author: Wendy Wasserstein

quote: “Nothing will work unless you do.”
author: Maya Angelou

quote: “We are all worms, But I do believe that I am a glow worm.”
author: Winston S. Churchill

quote: “Make the most of the best and the best of the worst, and keep your standards high. Never settle for anything less than you deserve or are capable of achieving.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “The one who falls and gets up is stronger than the one who never tried. Do not fear failure but rather fear not trying.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “I want to thank you, Lord, for life and all that's in it. Thank you for the day and for the hour, and the minute. ”
author: Maya Angelou

quote: “If you haven’t the strength to impose your own terms upon life, then you must accept the terms it offers you.”
author: T.S. Eliot

quote: “Self-respect is the root of discipline: The sense of dignity growswith the ability to say no to oneself.”
author: Abraham Joshua Heschel

quote: “Do not let the roles you play in life make you forget who you are.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “When you have exhausted all possibilities, remember this - you haven't.”
author: Thomas Edison

quote: “...there ain't no journey what don't change you some.”
author: David Mitchell

quote: “God, grant me the serenity to accept the things I cannot change, the courage to change the things I can, and the wisdom to know the difference.”
author: Reinhold Niebuhr

quote: “When you judge another, you do not define them, you define yourself.”
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: “You were born to stand out, stop trying to fit in.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.”
author: Albert Schweitzer

quote: “To write well, express yourself like the common people, but think like a wise man.”
author: Aristotle

quote: “Nothing's perfect, the world's not perfect. But it's there for us, trying the best it can; that's what makes it so damn beautiful.”
author: Hiromu Arakawa

quote: “Beauty is about being comfortable in your own skin. It's about knowing and accepting who you are.”
author: Ellen DeGeneres

quote: “Things die. But they don't always stay dead. Believe me, I know.”
author: Richelle Mead

quote: “It doesn't matter if a million people tell you what you can't do, or if ten million tell you no. If you get one yes from God that's all you need.”
author: Tyler Perry

quote: “Change may not always bring growth, but there is no growth without change.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Enthusiasm can help you find the new doors, but it takes passion to open them. If you have a strong purpose in life, you don't have to be pushed. Your passion will drive you there.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Let go of something old that no longer serves you in order to make room for something new.”
author: Roy T. Bennett
